LKB ( Linguistic Knowledge Builder ) is a grammar engineering environment for unification - based formalisms , typically HPSG .It includes a realiser that takes as input Minimal Recursion Semantics ( MRS ) .LKB is implemented in Common Lisp , and is freely available under an open source license .
